grades.name: SE Air Con
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features • 15" Alloy wheels  • Rear roof spoiler  •  AM/FM radio, CD player with Auxiliary input jack (AUX) and USB port • Driver and front passenger airbags • Electric front windows • Electrically adjustable door mirrors • Manual air-conditioning

grades.name: Tamura
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE Air Con model plus: • 16" Alloy wheels • Heated power-folding door mirrors • Side skirts • Four cylinder sports headlights • Privacy glass • Leather steering wheel with audio controls

grades.name: Tamura Nav Auto
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as SE Air Con model plus: • 6.1" Mazda Navigation System • 16" Alloy wheels • Heated power-folding door mirrors • Privacy glass • Leather steering wheel with audio controls • Dynamic Stability Control (DSC) with Traction Control System (TCS)

grades.name: Sport Venture
grades.disclaimer: Standard Features as Tamura model plus: • 6.1" Mazda Navigation System • Integrated Bluetooth® • Black sports cloth • 16" Bright alloy wheels • Climate control air-conditioning • Privacy glass • Front fog lights • Rear parking sensors
